title: FCI Signs MOU with WFP to Supply 2 Lakh Metric Tonnes of Rice for Global Hunger Relief - News On AIR
description: Read how the Food and Civil Supplies Corporation has signed a Memorandum of Understanding (MOU) with the World Food Programme, ensuring an export of 2 lakh metr
content:
1. FCI Signs MoU with WFP to Supply 2 Lakh Metric Tonnes of Rice for Global Hunger Relief  News On AIR
  2. India Strengthens Global Food Security: FCI Signs Five-Year Rice Supply Agreement with World Food Programme  PIB
  3. India To Supply 200,000 MT Rice To WFP Under Five-Year Agreement To Support Global Food Security  Swarajyamag

Stay updated on India's role in global food security initiatives. ### FEATURED_IMAGE_PROMPT: A striking image capturing the scene of FCI and WFP officials signing the MOU with a banner reading "Global Hunger Relief" behind them amidst a backdrop of international aid organizations, emphasizing the collaborative effort to combat world hunger. ### CONTENT_HTML:
